channel.title: CVE Feed for Supsystic -- Popup by Supsystic
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Supsystic -- Popup by Supsystic

item.title: CVE-2021-24275|2024-08-03T19:28:23.280Z -- supsystic -- popup%20by%20supsystic
item.description: The Popup by Supsystic WordPress plugin before 1.10.5 did not sanitise the tab parameter of its options page before outputting it in an attribute, leading to a reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue

item.title: CVE-2024-31421|2024-08-02T01:52:56.888Z -- supsystic -- popup%20by%20supsystic
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Supsystic Popup by Supsystic.This issue affects Popup by Supsystic: from n/a through 1.10.27.

item.title: CVE-2024-31421|2024-06-04T17:36:19.129Z -- supsystic -- popup%20by%20supsystic
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Supsystic Popup by Supsystic.This issue affects Popup by Supsystic: from n/a through 1.10.27.
